testcase.name: Creating application for Private Person
testcase.system-out: Given User navigates to landing page........................................passed When User selects Pramie beantragen button..................................passed When User Upload Files......................................................passed Then User verifies that Enter Personal Information page is loaded...........passed When User selects Private person radio button...............................passed Then User verifies that Company name and Sales tax ID field should not be dispalyed.passed And User enters data in fields for Private Person Frau and Kapoor and Prachi and xyz@pqr.com and Poonam Kapoor and DE68500105178297336485.passed Then User clicks Next button and verifies Personal details are correctly captured in Third page Frau and Kapoor and Prachi and xyz@pqr.com and Poonam Kapoor and DE68500105178297336485.passed
